exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce mdiv to an evaluable reference.
In environment b : mon 0 H : mdiv 0 b n_0 Unable to unify "n_0" with "b".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Found no subterm matching "c_n ?n 0 ?m" in the current goal.
The reference Nat.div_unique_apply was not found in the current environment.

In environment d, n : nat a : mon d b : mon (S d) H : mdiv (S d) b (c_n d n a) IHa : forall b : mon d, mdiv d b a -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a Unable to unify "c_n d n a" with "c_n d (n - pmon1 (S d) b + pmon1 (S d) b) (mult_mon d (div_mon d a (pmon2 (S d) b)) (pmon2 (S d) b))".

In environment d, n : nat a : mon d b : mon (S d) H : mdiv (S d) b (c_n d n a) IHa : forall b : mon d, mdiv d b a -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a Unable to unify "S ?M1403 = 0 -> False" with "c_n d (n - pmon1 (S d) b + pmon1 (S d) b) (mult_mon d (div_mon d a (pmon2 (S d) b)) (pmon2 (S d) b)) = c_n d n a".

In environment d, n : nat a : mon d b : mon (S d) H : mdiv (S d) b (c_n d n a) IHa : forall b : mon d, mdiv d b a -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a Unable to unify "0 <= Nat.gcd ?M1403 ?M1404" with "c_n d (n - pmon1 (S d) b + pmon1 (S d) b) (mult_mon d (div_mon d a (pmon2 (S d) b)) (pmon2 (S d) b)) = c_n d n a".

In environment d, n : nat a : mon d b : mon (S d) H : mdiv (S d) b (c_n d n a) IHa : forall b : mon d, mdiv d b a -> mult_mon d (div_mon d a b) b = a Unable to unify "mdiv 0 n_0 n_0" with "c_n d (n - pmon1 (S d) b + pmon1 (S d) b) (mult_mon d (div_mon d a (pmon2 (S d) b)) (pmon2 (S d) b)) = c_n d n a".

original: intros d a b H. unfold mult_mon, div_mon, mdiv in *. induction a. - rewrite mult_mon_zero_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite mdiv_cons with (n:=0), Nat.lcm. + rewrite Nat.div_unique_apply with (q:=b). * reflexivity. * apply Nat.neq_succ_0. + apply Nat.gcd_nonneg. + apply mdiv_nil.
